trans-unit.source: Represents a configurable property for the service.
trans-unit.target: 代表服務的可設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service endpoint to the configuration service.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的服務端點加入至設定服務。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 將服務端點加入至指定的合約、 繫結和端點位址的設定服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已新增之端點的合約的型別。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入之端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已新增之端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint added to the configuration service.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點加入至 設定服務。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 將服務端點加入至設定服務，使用指定的合約、 繫結，以及含有端點位址的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The type of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已新增之端點的合約的型別。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入之端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The Uri that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 包含加入之端點位址的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint added to the configuration service.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點加入至 設定服務。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with a specified contract, binding, endpoint address and URI that contains the address at which it listens.
trans-unit.target: 將服務端點加入至與指定的合約、 繫結、 端點位址和包含其接聽的位址的 URI 設定服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of contract implemented by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點所實作的合約型別。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入之端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已新增之端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The URI that contains the address which the endpoint listens for incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 包含端點接聽傳入訊息的位址的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint added to the configuration service.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點加入至 設定服務。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the configuration service with the specified contract, binding, and URIs that contain the endpoint and listening addresses.
trans-unit.target: 將服務端點加入至指定的合約、 繫結以及含有端點與接聽位址的 Uri，設定服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of contract implemented by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 端點所實作的合約型別。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入之端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The Uri that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 包含加入之端點位址的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The Uri that contains the address at which the endpoint listens for incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 包含端點接聽傳入訊息的位址的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint added to the configuration service.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點加入至 設定服務。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service authentication behavior.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務驗證行為。

trans-unit.source: The service authentication behavior.
trans-unit.target: 服務驗證行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the authorization behavior for the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務授權行為。

trans-unit.source: The authorization behavior for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的授權行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base addresses used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務所使用的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: The base addresses for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to close.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許服務關閉的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The timespan that specifies the interval of time allowed for the service to close.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許服務關閉的時間間隔的 timespan。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service credential.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務認證。

trans-unit.source: The service credential.
trans-unit.target: 服務認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service description.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: Enables a binding protocol with the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 啟用與服務端點繫結通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The binding protocol.
trans-unit.target: 繫結通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: A collection of service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity configuration for the service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務的身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: The identity configuration for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: Loads a configuration from the current service configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的服務組態中載入設定。

trans-unit.source: Loads the configuration from the current service configuration.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的服務組態中載入設定。

trans-unit.source: The configuration.
trans-unit.target: 組態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service to open.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許開啟服務的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The timespan that specifies the interval of time allowed for the service to open.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許開啟服務的時間間隔的 timespan。

trans-unit.source: Sets the endpoint address of the specified endpoint to the specified address.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之端點的端點位址設定指定的位址。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 端點位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service uses identity configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出服務是否使用身分識別組態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the service uses identify configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果服務使用，識別組態。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
